archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: Servicemanagementsysteem
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation: Een systeem dat de interne dienstverlening (servicemanagement) ondersteunt.

properties.value: TOPdesk (http://www.topdesk.nl), HP IT Service Management (http://www8.hp.com/us/en/software/enterprise-software.html), Planon Integrated Services Management (http://planonsoftware.com/nl/producten/integrated-services-management/)
